Reference

Query DHS API

Functions for interacting with each of the DHS API endpoints. They all start ‘dhs_’ for ease

dhs_countries()

API request of DHS Countries

dhs_data()

API request of DHS Indicator Data

dhs_dataUpdates()

API request of DHS Data Updates

dhs_datasets()

API request of DHS Datasets

dhs_geometry()

API request of DHS Geometry

dhs_indicators()

API request of DHS Indicators

dhs_info()

API request of DHS Info

dhs_publications()

API request of DHS Publications

dhs_surveyCharacteristics()

API request of DHS Survey Characteristics

dhs_surveys()

API request of DHS Surveys

dhs_tags()

API request of DHS Tags

dhs_uiUpdates()

API request of DHS UI Updates

Client

Create a rdhs client for downloading datasets, querying survey variables and extracting data

client_dhs()

Make a dhs client
